SnapBack's Featured Apps for Users

SnapBack is a powerful program that can make significant changes to your local machine all in the name of making it more convenient to use. Below are a number of featured apps the SnapBack community highly recommends you take advantage of and run. With this suite of featured apps, your PC will be better protected from data loss and will be optimized for increased speed and reliability.

Protect My PC


Quickly Protect Your Data

The Protect My PC app seeks to ensure that you set up basic data protection. The app accomplishes this by scheduling snapshots (copies of your data) and by enabling File History (limited to Windows 8 and up). By using both of these features, you will have comprehensive protection on your local machine in case a file goes missing.

Go to the Protect My PC App

Update My PC


Keep Your Computer Up-To-Date

With the Update My PC app, SnapBack takes control of the update process for Windows and many additional applications. You get to customize a schedule for when you want these updates to download and be applied. Say goodbye to annoying, often confusing, prompts telling you that you need to apply an update or patch.

Go to the Protect My PC App

Setup My PC


Save Time Setting Up a PC

Getting a new PC brings with it excitement and enthusiasm. However, one of the first problems we encounter is setting the computer up. This includes installing your favorite programs, removing the bloatware pre-installed on the machine, and making a few changes to the OS for optimization. The Setup My PC app does all of that in a click.

Go to the Protect My PC App

Manage My PCs


Easily Manage Multiple PCs

The Manage My PCs app is a truly revolutionary app. It allows you to effectively manage multiple computers from a single PCs. By setting up the app, you can push jobs, schedule updates, install new programs, and much more all synced to your various PCs and all accomplished with just a few clicks. Save your time administering your PCs.

Go to the Manage My PCs App

Manage My Internet


Save Precious Bandwidth

Shared internet connections, such as tethering, is becoming increasingly common. It gives you the ability to remain connected even in the remotest of locations. Unfortunately, however, Windows and your programs do not detect this and will try to apply updates, costing you bandwidth and data. This app corrects the problem.

Go to the Manage My Internet App

This is an Informational App

"Featured Apps" simply links to a select number of apps that the SnapBack community recommends to most users. There are no buttons nor any technical details to describe. Please see the individual apps for their specific technical information.
